Package game.gmk.players

Class GreedyPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.gmk.GomokuPlayer
      • game.gmk.players.GreedyPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player<GomokuAction>
    public class GreedyPlayer
extends GomokuPlayer
    An implementation of the GomokuPlayer that selects the cell of the board for an action that has the most consecutive neighbors. If there is more than one, chooses a random one.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.ArrayList<GomokuAction> actions
      Array for all possible actions.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected int countDirection​(int i, int j, int di, int dj, int c)
      Counts the number of consecutive cells from the specified start point at the specified direction belongs to the specified color.
      GomokuAction getAction​(GomokuAction prevAction, long[] remainingTimes)
      Returns the next action of the player.
      protected int score​(int i, int j, int c)
      The score of a cell is the aggregated value of the any direction from there computed by countDirection(int, int, int, int, int) function.

      • score

        protected int score​(int i,
                    int j,
                    int c)
        The score of a cell is the aggregated value of the any direction from there computed by countDirection(int, int, int, int, int) function.
        Parameters:
        i - row of the cell
        j - column of the cell
        c - color
        Returns:
        aggregated neighbor score

      • countDirection

        protected int countDirection​(int i,
                             int j,
                             int di,
                             int dj,
                             int c)
        Counts the number of consecutive cells from the specified start point at the specified direction belongs to the specified color.
        Parameters:
        i - row of start position
        j - column of start position
        di - row direction
        dj - column direction
        c - color
        Returns:
        number of consecutive cells
